column3: Emergency response mechanisms (Declare state of emergency)
Border restriction (Restricted entry for people from China); Border restriction (Restricted entry for people from high-risk areas)
Closure of educational institutions (Complete closure of all educational institutions); Mass gathering cancellation ()
Enhance laboratory testing capacity (Increase testing capacity (number tests)); Increase in medical supplies and equipment (Respirators, phlegm suctioning devices)
Measures to ensure security of supply (Fixing price for necessity goods)
The government provide assistance to vulnerable populations (The government provides food assistance)
Individual movement restrictions (Non-essential movements forbidden); Airport restriction (Airports closed)
Crisis management plans (Develop all-of-society and business continuity plans); Measures to ensure security of supply (Fixing price for necessity goods)
Individual movement restrictions (Non-essential movements forbidden); Individual movement restrictions (Segmentation of the population)
Individual movement restrictions (Curfew); Individual movement restrictions (Segmentation of the population)
